status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):cancelled (2):sor submitted / draft by Miss Maymie Sporer

scope_of_work.notes: This LSQ is for a reimbursable PO to cover repairs/order of materials, the value is for £30K and if this value is exceeded a new reimbursable PO will be required to cover additional spendUpon issue of a purchase order from the client this purchase order will be a draw off spend amount that will be used as required upon CBRE/Kyndryl approval until full amount of PO has been exhausted
scope_of_work.problem: Kyndryl space in Liverpool, Liver Building on 2nd Floor is due to go live from 1st April 2025, a reimbursable purchase order is required to fund adhoc items/repairs to ensure that the space runs with minimal impact to the occupants of the space
scope_of_work.scope: Issue of a Reimbursable PO to allow CBRE & Kyndryl to work together to fund repairs, materials, specialist contractor visits as required
scope_of_work.justification: This reimbursable purchase order is required to fund additional services/materials as required (detailed in scope of work and problem statement) without this purchase order we will not be able to do this which will impact the occupants within the floorspace and increase time to get repair works complete
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: No approval will result in prolonged time to get materials and repairs complete at the location

project_name: UPM-Liverpool - Liver Building Consumables, Start Up Items
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Roberta Wilkinson (2):work order closed by Miss Maymie Sporer (3):work commencement by Miss Maymie Sporer (4):work planning by Miss Maymie Sporer (5):offer approved (6):offer submitted by Miss Maymie Sporer (7):sor submitted / draft by Miss Maymie Sporer

scope_of_work.notes: This LSQ includes the items in the LSQ listed, additional items required will be funded under a separate LSQ
scope_of_work.problem: Liverpool Liver Building has started up and requires consumable items alongside recycling bins, stationary, kitchen items etc. These items are required to ensure the site start up runs smoothly and enables a excellent user experience for all who work at the location
scope_of_work.scope: Supply of various items to include basic stationary items, (paper, pens, whiteboard items, tape, small stationary items), Mugs, glasses, tea spoons etc at the location for glasses of water/hot drinks (tea, sugar, coffee, sponges, washing up liquid etc.). There is also a requirement for separate waste bins for food, recyclate, general and glass, these will be ordered to be placed in strategic locations around the building. Snap Frames to be placed around the location alongside sticky labels for desk QR codes are also required. HDMI Leads to be provided for desktop screens
scope_of_work.justification: These items are required to enable an excellent user experience of the location at the Liver building on the 2nd Floor, the area is currently starting to be occupied however will be having a big launch on 1st May 2025 that will require everything to run smoothly, these items within this LSQ will help this happen.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: The user experience may not be what is expected by the occupants of the building which would take away from all the hard work that has gone into the location to ensure a smooth start up
